item.title: Krista add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "I have decided to stick to love...Hate is too great a burden to bear." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Krista add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Faith is taking the first step even when you can't see the whole staircase." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Krista add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Krista add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "We must accept finite disappointment, but never lose infinite hope." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Krista add a quote by Devon Ashley
item.description: "I'm not looking for the perfect man. I'm looking for the man whose imperfections I can put up with." -- Devon Ashley

item.title: Krista add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "Until I feared I would lose it, I never loved to read. One does not love breathing." -- Harper Lee

item.title: Krista add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "You never really understand a person until you consider things from his point of view... Until you climb inside of his skin and walk around in it." -- Harper Lee

item.title: Krista add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "I wanted you to see what real courage is, instead of getting the idea that courage is a man with a gun in his hand. It's when you know you're licked before you begin, but you begin anyway and see it through no matter what. - Atticus Finch" -- Harper Lee

item.title: Krista add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "Mockingbirds don’t do one thing but make music for us to enjoy. They don’t eat up people’s gardens, don’t nest in corncribs, they don’t do one thing but sing their hearts out for us. That’s why it’s a sin to kill a mockingbird." -- Harper Lee

item.title: Krista add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "You just hold your head high and keep those fists down. No matter what anybody says to you, don't you let 'em get your goat. Try fightin' with your head for a change. -Atticus Finch" -- Harper Lee

item.title: Krista add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "Pass the damn ham, please." -- Harper Lee

item.title: Krista add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "Neighbors bring food with death and flowers with sickness and little things in between. Boo was our neighbor. He gave us two soap dolls, a broken watch and chain, a pair of good-luck pennies, and our lives. But neighbors give in return. We never put back into the tree what we took out of it: we had given him nothing, and it made me sad." -- Harper Lee

item.title: Krista add a quote by Fannie Flagg
item.description: "Remember if people talk behind your back, it only means you are two steps ahead." -- Fannie Flagg

item.title: Krista add a quote by Fannie Flagg
item.description: "Face it girls. I'm older and I have more insurance." -- Fannie Flagg

item.title: Krista add a quote by Fannie Flagg
item.description: "You never know what's in a person's heart until they're tested, do you?" -- Fannie Flagg

item.title: Krista add a quote by Fannie Flagg
item.description: "The food in the South is as important as food anywhere because it defines a person's culture." -- Fannie Flagg

item.title: Krista add a quote by Lewis Grizzard
item.description: "Life is like a dogsled race. If you ain't the lead dog, the scenery never changes." -- Lewis Grizzard

item.title: Krista add a quote by Stephanie Perkins
item.description: "The more you know who you are, and what you want, the less you let things upset you." -- Stephanie Perkins

item.title: Krista add a quote by Stephanie Perkins
item.description: "For the two of us, home isn't a place. It is a person. And we are finally home." -- Stephanie Perkins

item.title: Krista add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "If you don't have time to read, you don't have the time (or the tools) to write. Simple as that." -- Stephen King

item.title: Krista add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Books are the perfect entertainment: no commercials, no batteries, hours of enjoyment for each dollar spent. What I wonder is why everybody doesn't carry a book around for those inevitable dead spots in life." -- Stephen King

item.title: Krista add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "If you liked being a teenager, there's something really wrong with you." -- Stephen King

item.title: Krista add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Sometimes being a bitch is all a woman's got to hold on to." -- Stephen King

item.title: Krista add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "A little talent is a good thing to have if you want to be a writer. But the only real requirement is the ability to remember every scar." -- Stephen King

item.title: Krista add a quote by King, Stephen
item.description: "God grant me to SERENITY to accept what I cannot change the TENACITY to change what I may and the GOOD LUCK not to f*** up too often" -- King, Stephen

item.title: Krista add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Hearts can break. Yes, hearts can break. Sometimes I think it would be better if we died when they did, but we don't." -- Stephen King

item.title: Krista add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Hug and kiss whoever helped get you - financially, mentally, morally, emotionally - to this day. Parents, mentors, friends, teachers. If you're too uptight to do that, at least do the old handshake thing, but I recommend a hug and a kiss. Don't let the sun go down without saying thank you to someone, and without admitting to yourself that absolutely no one gets this far alone." -- Stephen King

item.title: Krista add a quote by E. Lockhart
item.description:
"It is better to be alone, she figures, than to be with someone who can't see who you are. It is better to lead than to follow. It is better to speak up than stay silent. It is better to open doors than to shut them on people.
She will not be simple and sweet. She will not be what people tell her to be. That Bunny Rabbit is dead." -- E. Lockhart

item.title: Krista add a quote by Sylvia Plath
item.description: "And by the way, everything in life is writable about if you have the outgoing guts to do it, and the imagination to improvise. The worst enemy to creativity is self-doubt." -- Sylvia Plath

item.title: Krista add a quote by Sylvia Plath
item.description: "I have the choice of being constantly active and happy or introspectively passive and sad. Or I can go mad by ricocheting in between." -- Sylvia Plath
